attributes.action: Ban horse racing! Stop the abuse of these beautiful animals
attributes.additional_details:
Why should these people make money from these poor horses dying.
Horses are one of the most beautiful, gracious and most loving animals you will find, so why is it acceptable for people to treat them the way they do?
They don’t deserve to be pushed to there limits until they die just so people get entertainment and money, it’s not right and it’s about time we stop it.
attributes.background: Every year we have the grand national televised but little do people know once these poor horses fall over or sustain an injury they’re not treated and looked after until they’re better, they’re killed because they will never run the same again and they won’t make that person money.
